dict.string:
Usage:
dev {keyword}
By default, the current clipboard content will be used as the input (if available).
To change the "dev" prefix, double click the "List Filter" item and change the "keyword".
For more customizations, see the documentation:
https://devutils.app/integrations/

[{"title":"Unix Time Converter","arg":"unixtime","subtitle":"Parse and display UNIX the timestamp string currently in your clipboard"},{"title":"JSON Format\/Validate","arg":"jsonformatter","subtitle":"Format the JSON string currently in your clipboard (if it’s a valid JSON)"},{"title":"Base64 String Encode\/Decode","arg":"base64encode","subtitle":"Decode the Base64 string in clipboard (if it’s decodable)"},{"title":"Base64 Image Encode\/Decode","arg":"base64image","subtitle":"Decode the Base64 string in clipboard to an image (if it’s decodable)"},{"title":"JWT Debugger","arg":"jwt","subtitle":"Decode and verify the current JWT token in your clipboard"},{"title":"RegExp Tester","arg":"regextester","subtitle":"Test your regular expression with a string and inspect matches, groups, etc."},{"title":"URL Encode\/Decode","arg":"urlencode","subtitle":"Decode the current URL string in your clipboard (if any)"},{"title":"URL Parser","arg":"querystringparser","subtitle":"Parse the URL string currently in your clipboard"},{"title":"HTML Entity Encode\/Decode","arg":"htmlencode","subtitle":"Escape (or unescape) the HTML entities your current clipboard string"},{"title":"Backslash Escape\/Unescape","arg":"backslash","subtitle":"Escape (or unescape) backslashes in your current clipboard string"},{"title":"UUID\/ULID Generate\/Decode","arg":"uuidtool","subtitle":"Decode the UUID in your clipboard (if any), or generate UUIDs"},{"title":"HTML Preview","arg":"htmlpreview","subtitle":"Show a HTML preview of your current clipboard string"},{"title":"Text Diff Checker","arg":"textdiff","subtitle":"Compare two texts and find diff (per characters, words, lines, etc.)"},{"title":"YAML to JSON","arg":"yaml2json","subtitle":"Convert your current clipboard from YAML to JSON"},{"title":"JSON to YAML","arg":"json2yaml","subtitle":"Convert your current clipboard from JSON to YAML"},{"title":"Number Base Converter","arg":"numberbase","subtitle":"Convert numbers between bases (oct, hex, binary, etc.)"},{"title":"HTML Beautify\/Minify","arg":"htmlformatter","subtitle":"Beautify or minify your current clipboard as HTML"},{"title":"CSS Beautify\/Minify","arg":"cssformatter","subtitle":"Beautify or minify your current clipboard as CSS"},{"title":"JS Beautify\/Minify","arg":"jsformatter","subtitle":"Beautify or minify your current clipboard as JavaScript"},{"title":"ERB Beautify\/Minify","arg":"erbformatter","subtitle":"Beautify or minify your current clipboard as ERB"},{"title":"LESS Beautify\/Minify","arg":"lessformatter","subtitle":"Beautify or minify your current clipboard as LESS"},{"title":"SCSS Beautify\/Minify","arg":"scssformatter","subtitle":"Beautify or minify your current clipboard as SCSS"},{"title":"XML Beautify\/Minify","arg":"xmlformatter","subtitle":"Beautify or minify your current clipboard as XML"},{"title":"Lorem Ipsum Generator","arg":"loremipsum","subtitle":"Get some randomly generated lorem ipsum strings"},{"title":"QR Code Reader\/Generator","arg":"qrcode","subtitle":"Generate a QR code from your current clipboard string"},{"title":"String Inspector","arg":"stringinspect","subtitle":"Inspect your current clipboard string (length, words count, unicode, etc.)"},{"title":"JSON to CSV","arg":"json2csv","subtitle":"Convert your current clipboard from JSON to CSV"},{"title":"CSV to JSON","arg":"csv2json","subtitle":"Convert your current clipboard from CSV to JSON"},{"title":"Hash Generator","arg":"hashing","subtitle":"Calculate the hash of your current clipboard string"},{"title":"HTML to JSX","arg":"html2jsx","subtitle":"Convert the HTML string in clipboard to JSX"},{"title":"Markdown Preview","arg":"markdownpreview","subtitle":"Preview the markdown string currently in your clipboard"},{"title":"SQL Formatter","arg":"sqlformatter","subtitle":"Format the SQL string currently in your clipboard"},{"title":"String Case Converter","arg":"stringcaseconverter","subtitle":"Convert a string in clipboard into various naming conventions"},{"title":"Cron Job Parser","arg":"cronparser","subtitle":"Parse the cron job expression in clipboard (if it’s a valid cron expression)"},{"title":"Color Converter","arg":"colortools","subtitle":"Pick and convert colors (hex, rgb, hsv, hsv, cymk, etc.)"},{"title":"PHP to JSON","arg":"php2json","subtitle":"Convert a PHP object\/array in your clipboard to JSON"},{"title":"JSON to PHP","arg":"json2php","subtitle":"Convert a JSON string in your clipboard to PHP object\/array"},{"title":"PHP Serializer","arg":"phpserializer","subtitle":"Serialize the PHP object\/array in your clipboard"},{"title":"PHP Unserializer","arg":"phpunserializer","subtitle":"Unserialize the string in your clipboard to a PHP object\/array"},{"title":"Random String Generator","arg":"randomstringgenerator","subtitle":"Generate password or random string with symbols, digits, words, etc."}]
Give your current clipboard to DevUtils

Official DevUtils.app integration for Alfred.
Usage:
dev {keyword}
Check the README item in the workflow for more customization.
You must install DevUtils.app to use this workflow.
When you activate a tool in DevUtils, the clipboard content (if any) will be used by default.
See details: https://devutils.app
